# PixbufSaveFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate bool PixbufSaveFunc(byte[] buf, ulong count, out IntPtr error, IntPtr data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| buf | Transfer ownership: none |
| count | Transfer ownership: none |
| error | Transfer ownership: full |
| data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
